text: Pros - sehr, sehr flache Hierarchien - volle transparenz - extrem kluges, aber auch nettes team - after-work bier ab 18 uhr - büro ist extrem zentral direkt am rosa-luxemburg platz Cons - team ist wenn es drauf ankommt schon sehr viel am arbeiten Advice to Management - weiter so, wäre gerne dabei geblieben
title: Wahnsinnig engagiertes Gründer-Team

text: Pros Incredible start-up environment! If you are looking for something fast paced - where an idea will be put into action by the end of day, then Comtravo would be the perfect fit for you. The management recognises talent and allows self development in a direction desired by the employee. International atmosphere, great colleagues, lots of benefits and team buildings. You will laugh a lot and have a great time! Cons Not much to say here! Advice to Management Keep it up!
title: Full transparency, high responsibility and lots of fun
